Package farm

Class Player

java.lang.Object
farm.Player
Direct Known Subclasses:
Farmer
public abstract class Player extends Object
Abstract class that represents a Player.

Objects of this class have a name, level, exp, and currency called object coins.

  • Method Details

    • update

      public boolean update()
      This method updates the player level based on the earned exp.

      For every 100 exp gained, the player will level up.

      Returns:
      true if the player leveled up, false otherwise.

    • plant

      public boolean plant(Crop crop, Tile tile)
      This method plants a crop into a tile.

      The method will check if the player has enough object coins to plant the crop. If true then Tile.addCrop(Crop) is called.

      If planting was successful, the player will lose object coins.

      Parameters:
      crop - the Crop object that will be planted.
      tile - the Tile object to be planted to.
      Returns:
      true if planting was successful, false otherwise.

    • useTool

      public boolean useTool(Tool tool, Tile tile)
      This method uses a tool on a tile.

      The method will check if the player can afford to use the tool first. If true, then Tool.use(Tile) is called. If the called method returns true then the player gains exp and loses object coins based on the Tool variables. Otherwise, if the called method returned false, then the method will check if tool is an instance of Shovel.

      Parameters:
      tool - Tool object to be used by the player.
      tile - Tile object where the tool will be used on.
      Returns:
      true if the tool was used successfully, false otherwise.

    • addObjectCoins

      public void addObjectCoins(double coins)
      This method adds to the player's object coin count.
      Parameters:
      coins - amount of object coins to be added.

    • useObjectCoins

      public void useObjectCoins(double coins)
      This method deducts from the player's object coin count.
      Parameters:
      coins - amount of object coins to be deducted.

    • gainExp

      public void gainExp(double exp)
      This method adds to the player exp.
      Parameters:
      exp - amount of exp to be added.
